activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11595
activity.text:
Hi @yash-learner , Thanks for opening this issue .
Here is what I will do :
I will investigate the regression in Tailwind v4 that has removed or altered cursor-pointer. I will test whether the utility class is being overridden, ensure it's enabled in tailwind.config.js, and apply fixes accordingly. If needed, I will propose an alternative approach using @layer base to restore the expected behavior.

Expected Timeline:

Investigation & Debugging: 1 day

Fix Implementation & Testing: 2 days

PR Submission: 2 days from assignment

Looking forward to contributing!

Would you like any adjustments to the proposal? ðŸš€
